active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a multi-tenant cloud environment, debate whether perfect data isolation is achievable or if inherent risks always remain. Use real-world examples like the Capital One AWS breach (where a misconfigured web application firewall exposed S3 buckets across tenants) to support your position. Consider trade-offs between isolation strength and performance.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding
